name: Santal & Vetiver Aluminum-Free Clear Gel Deodorant for Sensitive Skin
categories: Bath & Body, Body Care, Deodorant & Antiperspirant
about: What it is: A powerful, yet gentle aluminum-free deodorant gel formulated without baking soda for sensitive skin...Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Balm..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free...Fragrance Family: Earthy & Woody..Scent Type: Warm Woods..Key Notes: Santal, Vetiver, Amber..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Probiotics: Balance skins microbiome to neutralize odor and replenish healthy bacteria..- Spirulina: An antioxidant-rich superfood that soothes irritated skin..- Hyaluronic Acid: An ultra-hydrating humectant able to retain up to 1000x its weight in moisture...What Else You Need to Know: This is a solid gel deodorant formulated without aluminum and baking soda for sensitive skin. Soothe and focus with the bestselling scent, Santal & Vetiver. This invisible formula glides onto skin without transferring onto clothes. Seaweed extracts and hyaluronic acid soothe and moisturize the skin while probiotics neutralize odor by balancing bacteria...
ingredients: -Probiotics: Balance skins microbiome to neutralize odor and replenish healthy bacteria..-Spirulina: An antioxidant-rich superfood that soothes irritated skin..-Hyaluronic Acid: An ultra-hydrating humectant able to retain up to 1000x its weight in moisture...Propylene Glycol (BIOBASED), Water, Sodium Stearate, Polyglyceryl-10 Caprylate/Caprate, Propanediol, Saccharomyces Ferment, Parfum (Fragrance), Glycerin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hyaluronic Acid, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Saccharina Longicruris (Seaweed) Extract, Maranta Arundinacea Root Powder, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply generously for skin-soothing protection throughout the day..-Apply to clean, dry skin..-For external use only...Recycling Instructions:.-Recyclable packaging made from recovered ocean plastic and other recycled materials.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used this deodorant and I love it! I works all day and smells amazing. The only reason I docked a star is because it melts. I keep my house at 64 degrees yearly so I know its not heat causing it to melt, which makes everything gross and greasy..  stuff
Been using this brand exclusively for a year, my armpits no longer sting or hurt! Wont use any other brand, plus this scent is the best out of all of them! Smells like the Nordic spa!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im actually shocked by the low reviews. This is the best deodorant I have ever used and Ive recommended it several times. Its lightweight, doesnt leave a residue, smells great, and last all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It doesnt protect all day. I wouldnt recommend this product in the summer. Also it kinda melts. I put it to my makeup bag while i was traveling. It messed up my bag and my all makeup products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has irritated my skin so bad and its suppose to be good for sensitive skin. My underarms burn so bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the sent and the way it feels, but it unfortunately didnt work well for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for probably the past year (if not longer) and this is the best natural and aluminum-free deodorant I've used. Long-lasting and the scent lingers for me. I don't smell like BO throughout the day using it, and I also find the texture super comfortable under my arms (no weird bumps or redness!). If you haven't detoxed to an aluminum-free deodroant, be sure to do so before writing this deodorant off, because this is the best! Please don't ever change this formula -- all other clean/aluminum-free deodorants I have used make my armpits react poorly, but not this one (and I have extremely sensitive skin).

Smells amazing initially. Then I smell like BO badddd after a couple hours. I really tried to push through hoping I could make this my regular deodorant but I stink. Yesterday I went back to Native and no BO smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: EVERYONE- MUST DETOX BEFORE USING ALUMINUM FREE DEODORANT.  THIS WILL NOT WORK FOR YOU IF YOU DON'T!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointing. This was literally painful, giving me red bumps all over my armpits. Returning.
Super disappointed in this, get the extra strength instead! After about 1-2 hours it smells like a mixture of body odor and the deodorants scent, and also caused me itchiness and redness.

reviews.review_title: I dont want to smell like a stank bog, actually
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells nice but unfortunately it did not make me smell nice.  I dont think Ive ever smelled as bad as with this deodorant.  Im not sure if it plays poorly with my body chemistry and might work better for yall, but yikes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this formula because it doesnt transfer onto clothing at all. However, do not use if you sweat or are worrying about profuse stink, LOL. This is definitely a lighter formula, and the scent doesnt last as long. I figured this out the hard way at the gym, so take my word for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells really good. It left an extremely uncomfortable sticky residue in my underarms and then started to chafe. I would smell really musty within 4 hours. Not worth $20.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smelled so good, but didnt work at all for me unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product at first but I always noticed my armpits would get red bumps and ingrown hair so I tried not using it for a week and it went away it also doesnt last long. But it does smell good at least.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Returned after 3 days, terrible smell and not lasting at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it so bad, I gave this over a week before writing my review. The smell of the deodorant itself is incredible, however, it has zero staying power. I feel like I am having to constantly reapply if I want to not smell. It just does not last long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I cannot use deodorant with baking soda. I typically buy Glossier or Native, but thought I would try something different. I saw the mixed reviews but hoped that the negative feedback was due to people  not being used to natural deodorant. Unfortunately I was wrong. This formula is horrible. It doe make you smell worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great glides on easily. No residue or gunk. I have sensitive skin and no burn from baking soda or astringents.  Lasts all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell. Combines and works with my body well. Unobtrusive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing for the first hour then smells disgusting. Ive never ever had a deodorant do this and especially one for $30 thats crazy will be returning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a month ago now and have been using it every day. I wanted to love it! Love the branding, love the smell. I needed the sensitive one as sodium bicarbonate gives me a rash. So- love that they have it as an option. Prior to this deodorant I had just been using the aluminium free Degree or Dove. Obviously huge price difference- but the Degree or Dove works so much better.  Sadly this deodorant while initially smelling great would barely last a few hours. I started to have to reapply which I never usually do. My husband tried it too but he didnt last very long and is now back to his usual deodorant too.   I bought the shower gel which smells great & Id buy that again. But I wont be buying the deodorant again sadly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had a travel size of this and absolutely loved it. I bought the full size version and it almost immediately started leaking out of the bottom, so much so that it left a stain in my medicine cabinet. I never had this problem with the travel sized version.  I stuck it in the fridge to hopefully stop the melting and when I took it out, the bottom of the container completely popped off and wouldnt go back in. Its useless now lol. I love the smell, but it definitely doesnt keep BO at bay in the hotter seasons. Not worth $20.00

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I cannot use deodorant with baking soda. I typically buy Glossier or Native, but thought I would try something different. I saw the mixed reviews but hoped that the negative feedback was due to people  not being used to natural deodorant. Unfortunately I was wrong. This formula is horrible. It doe make you smell worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great glides on easily. No residue or gunk. I have sensitive skin and no burn from baking soda or astringents.  Lasts all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell. Combines and works with my body well. Unobtrusive.

reviews.review_text: Smells amazing for the first hour then smells disgusting. Ive never ever had a deodorant do this and especially one for $30 thats crazy will be returning

reviews.review_title: Love the smell but thats about it..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the smell of this. Love. However, it lasts maybe? 12 hours at best. Not a heavy sweater and typically not a u201csmellyu201d sweater. Been using natural deodorant for well over five years. This makes me feel like Im back to purgin. Its definitely formulated for sensitive skin as Ive had zero issues or discomfort but definitely requires reapplication after about 10 hours of a normal day. Havent even tried to wear to a workout because I dont see it lasting through it.

reviews.review_title: Did not live up to hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells great, but it's not effective. I'm not particularly smelly, but this did literally nothing for me, and I *slightly* smelled. Not understanding the hype, I wished I liked this more. If you aren't smelly at all and don't sweat then I guess it'd be fine, but it's literally deodorant so...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great natural deodorant the smell is fresh and warm but not overly masculine I haven't had any issues with packaging but I haven't traveled with it. A gel deodorant is more likely to have melting issues but they have this scent in cream as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: packaging is terrible, it leaks out the bottom when you use it.  wouldn't buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im not a big review writer, but I read them and find them useful so here it goes. I bought this deodorant direct from the company website and I really enjoy it. By the end of the day there is a body order, but for an all natural deodorant thats to be expected.  My issue is the packaging. After my first purchase the bottle started to leak what I would assume is scent fluid? Its thick and sticky and gets all over. I emailed Salt & Stone, they said it was a defective batch and very graciously sent me a second bottle. That second bottle also leaks. I will not be purchasing again as it is too much of a mess

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nice but do NOT recommend if youre pretty sweaty or plan to wear during a workout as it does not last. Packaging is awful - the product leaks through the twist part so theres oil all over. Not impressed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THE SCENT IT AMAZING. This will have you smelling like fresh laundry all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nice but it doesnt last more than an hour and I found myself having to reapply multiple times a day. I tried the regular one (the non gel one) and it lasts longer. I personally prefer the hinoki one, it smells more feminine than this one does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this deodorant. Last on me all day.  Smell is nice too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The most amazing deodorant. Smells so fresh and pretty gender neutral which I like in my deodorants.

reviews.review_title: Maybe if you dont have super stinky armpits
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this was the first one I tried and it did not last at all. However I love the neroli and basil one from this line it lasted ALL DAY and I use it every single day and am looooving the staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this deodorant! It smells absolutely amazing! I also love that it is aluminum free! It is gel roll on so no need to worry about goes white stain marks on your clothes! I would definitely repurchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, this Salt and Stone deodorant has no aluminum in it which is perfect for me because I have sensitive skin. I really love the way santal smells and this scent is very subtle, not too strong! I love how this also lasts me all day long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only deodorant I'll be using from now on! I've been searching for a good aluminum-free deodorant for a while and couldn't find any good formulas that have a nice scent, don't leave stains on shirts and help nourishing the skin. This deodorant is 100% the best! Very gentle formula, Santal scent (which is amazing), no white cast on my shirts. The packaging is great, super easy to bring it everywhere with me.   Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best natural deodorant on the market. Every time I use Salt and Stone Im amazed just how effective clean health and beauty can be!!  Inherently I do have to reapply throughout the day, however this product has completely eliminated my body Oder!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great deodorant it works really good for being a natural deodorant and this is the new gel version i like it a lot so far the smell is great also dont wear it with white clothing. but it works good and lasts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: not for me. i like gel deodorants but this hurt and irritated my under arms and smell is wierd.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried it first time and I felt in love the smell is subtle doesnt make my underarms itchy or wet the formula is very Light weight and absorbs in the skin so well it doesnt seems like youre wearing anything also it lasts all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been super untrusting of buying non aluminum products. All the ones Ive used in the past have worked horribly. However, this has worked amazing and smells SO good. The scents are so good and I would definitely say are unisex.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the feel and smell of this Salt and Stone aluminum-free and natural gel deodorant. Having already acclimated my body to a natural deodorant this was no big switch but a happy surprise by the texture and smell! Cant wait to test it further in the summer heat!

RUN AWAY. They have a horrible YUKA score.  I used to love them- paid 20 a pop to have no toxins in my deodorant during cancer- until I just found out that while they might have a couple good they tout, it actually rates HORRIBLY. Imagine, charging 4Xs the cost of other deodorant bc u2018theyre clean & rating horribly on YUKA! False advertising!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This gel deodorant works extremely well! I love that the scent is not too powerful but also helps during a hot day! It glides on perfectly. I sweat a lot but with this deodorant I have not. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Salt and Stones Sandal and Vetiver Gel Deodorant is a solid choice for those seeking a natural alternative to traditional deodorants. The scent is earthy and pleasant, with subtle notes of sandalwood and vetiver that provide a refreshing aroma. I appreciate the gel formula, as it goes on smoothly and dries quickly without leaving any residue. Plus, the ingredients are clean and non-toxic, which is always a plus for me. While it effectively controls odor throughout the day, I did notice that it may require reapplication during particularly active or hot days. Overall, a reliable option for everyday use, earning four stars in my book

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This deodorant is 100% worth it! I love that the scent is subtle and that because its gel it doesnt get all over your clothes or leave visible residue like a lot of deodorants. It is so easy to apply would definitely get again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been super untrusting of buying non aluminum products. All the ones Ive used in the past have worked horribly. However, this has worked amazing and smells SO good. The scents are so good and I would definitely say are unisex.
